attributes.action: Automaticaly change the A2 lisence to A
attributes.additional_details: Because it is unfair on trying to make people spend more money on the same lisence. Also we are no longer in EU so we should not obey by they're laws. We should have ours back
attributes.background: We want to retern to the origional law of motorcycle tests. We took on the EU law on how to obtain the A lisence through an A2. Which is 2 years of riding on an A2 or reach the age of 24 to be able to ride a bigger bike.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640310
